title: Initial Consultation
text: Discuss client requirements, goals, and preferences. Provide an overview of services, technologies, and design options

title: Contract Signing
text: Draft a formal contract specifying project scope, deliverables, payment terms, and deadlines.Both parties review, negotiate if necessary, and sign the contract.

title: Craft & Code
text: Craft & Code Our expert team meticulously designs and codes, sculpting the digital masterpiece that is your Tailored needs, combining creativity and technology for maximum impact.

title: Deliver & Optimize
text: We lift the curtains on your web project, fine-tuning and optimizing every detail to make sure your online presence shines bright and stays ahead of the digital move
